请将游戏更新至最新版本
请阅读并接收我们的隐私政策和服务条款

Bloons TD 5需要广告支持

如果你同意，我们将会追踪小部分关于你的数据用于个性化广告推荐，这将不会改变你看到的广告数量，但你可能会看到你更感兴趣的广告

此数据会被安全的存储起来并且不会被用于其他用途
在%s内领取你的下一个奖励！
开始建造你的猴子小镇！

在两张新地图：乡间小路和U型弯测试你的技术
乡间小路是一张中等难度的中级图，而U型弯则是一张面向高级玩家的地图，你能在这两张地图获得所有的奖章吗？
也可以在合作模式游玩这两张地图

在两张新地图：乡间小路和U型弯测试你的技术
乡间小路是一张中等难度的中级图，而U型弯则是一张面向高级玩家的地图，你能在这两张地图获得所有的奖章吗？
这两张地图也可以在合作模式游玩
这里是高级商店，想要快速解锁升级？猴钞不足？需要硬币？你想要的任何东西都在这里
这里是高级商店，需要人手来对付气球？需要硬币？你想要的任何东西都在这里
这里是荣誉殿堂，你可以在这里查看你所获得的成就
这里是荣誉殿堂，你可以在这里查看你所获得的成就，如果你连接到了Game Center你可以在排行榜上与你的好友竞争
实验室升级能够给你提供各种游戏内加成，你需要使用通关地图和特别任务获得的硬币来升级加成，升级按钮上会显示升级需要的硬币数量，点击加成可以查看该加成的效果
特工可以使用猴钞购买，购买后可在游戏内使用，放置的特工在该局游戏结束后不会返还，但能提供各种支援
每个防御塔都有两条升级路径，升级路径中的项目能够提升防御塔的能力或添加手动技能，这个界面能够让你查看每个防御塔的升级解锁情况与解锁需要的经验，你可以通过充钱来立即解锁升级（这里应该是另一个无内购版的文本，可能是NK做steam版时用错文本了）
每个防御塔都有两条升级路径，升级路径中的项目能够提升防御塔的能力或添加手动技能，这个界面能够让你查看每个防御塔的升级解锁情况与解锁需要的经验
购买这块空地并建造各种各样的专长建筑，专长建筑会提升特定猴子的能力，同时只能激活一个建筑，但每个建筑在满级时都有4项加成
这是特工和技能的部署栏，你可以从这里将特工放置在地图上\n\n当你购买了带有技能的升级时该技能就会添加进你的部署面板，你可以通过点击技能图标快速激活防御塔的技能,技能激活后有冷却时间，在冷却完成前不能再次激活该防御塔的技能
你的存档来自一个较新版本的游戏，请将游戏更新至最新版本以使用此存档

使用橡子攻击气球，愤怒松鼠在气球逃走后会进入暴走状态，在一定时间内提高攻速，并获得探测迷彩和破铅的能力
专家级 - 怒火冲天！愤怒松鼠现在更加愤怒，即使没有气球逃走在扔出50个橡子后也会进入暴走，暂时提高攻速，获得探测迷彩和破铅的能力
每回合长出几串能够给予你额外现金的香蕉，点击收集
香蕉农夫会自动收集范围内的所有香蕉
专家级 - 香蕉大炮！香蕉农夫在收集香蕉后会往路径上扔香蕉皮，踩到香蕉皮的气球会滑到路径的入口
养蜂熊的蜜蜂会持续附着在气球上刺破气球，蜜蜂不能刺破铅气球但对重生气球有额外的攻速
专家级 - 蜂群！蜂群技能会释放100个蜜蜂，蜜蜂在短时间内会自动寻找目标刺破气球，不能刺破铅气球和冰冻气球但对重生气球有额外的攻速
在路径上种下这个快速生长的气球杀手，每击破一个气球就会损失一个尖刺，但每回合会长出10个尖刺（最多带有200个尖刺）
专家级 - 触手！每三回合灌木的附近就会长出一个最多带有15个尖刺的触手，尖刺耗尽后触手会消失，灌木每回合长出10个尖刺，最多带有200个尖刺
吸入并切割一层气球，切割后的气球会从切割机的尾部回到路径上
气球末日装置能够给你提供一个临时的气球打击卫星，卫星的激光能够摧毁所有种类的气球并重创飞艇
专家级 - 等离子射线！激光划过的地方会留下等离子痕迹，此痕迹能够伤害所有种类的气球和飞艇
向气球射出范围爆炸的炸弹，可击破铅气球
投掷沿圆弧飞行的回旋镖，每个回旋镖能击破3个气球
使用机枪射出飞镖，射向你所触摸的位置
投掷一个能击破一个气球的飞镖
放置在路径上，3秒后爆炸
射出一团能够使气球减速的胶水
带有两个飞镖枪和多个巡逻设定的强力直升机
暂时冻结附近的气球，尖锐的子弹无法击破被冰冻的气球
狐獴间谍不能攻击，但能用它强力的感知探测迷彩气球，可以给其范围内的所有防御塔提供迷彩探测
专家级 - 高科技眼球！狐獴间谍现在可以击破单个气球并对飞艇造成伤害，为范围内的防御塔提供迷彩探测
在空中按指定轨迹飞行，每次向周围射出8个强力飞镖
扔出能够击破两个气球的魔法炮弹
射出能够击破5个气球的飞镖，只能放置在水上
使用强力射钉枪，建造哨兵，陷阱，提供超频
投掷一个能击破一个气球的飞镖
投掷一个能击破一个气球的飞镖
能够发射追踪飞镖的水上防御塔，升级后可以在其他防御塔的范围内射击气球，也可以下潜辅助其他防御塔攻击
减少范围内防御塔10%的购买和升级价格
向屏幕上的指定位置发射迫击炮弹
快速扔出手里剑攻击气球，可攻击迷彩气球
忍者几维鸟可以快速踢击气球并使其飞回前面的路径，可攻击迷彩气球
专家级 - 攻速加快，可攻击铅气球
通过浮桥在水上放置陆地防御塔！将浮桥放置在水上，然后将陆地防御塔放置在浮桥上
专家级 - 高级浮桥！高级浮桥可以连接至猴镇总部，为浮桥上的防御塔提供射程加成，将浮桥放置在水上，然后将陆地防御塔放置在浮桥上
没有地方放船？便携湖可以为你的水上单位提供水域
专家级 - 海怪！新的技能能够唤醒海怪，攻击附近的气球，一次击破5层而且有概率眩晕气球，可将水上单位放置在便携湖中
这些史前翼龙会围绕着它们的巢飞行并击破碰到它们的气球，巢里的蛋会随时间流逝逐渐孵化
专家级 - 更加强大的翼手龙！现在翼手龙的翅膀能够吹飞气球，并且在归巢前能够击破更多气球
放置在路径上，每个刺钉堆能击破10个气球
击破两层气球，无限射程
每回合生成可以击破5个气球的刺钉堆
以极快的速度扔出飞镖
这是一只鸟，这是一个飞机，这是一个能够摧毁屏幕上所有小气球并重创飞艇的超猴侠中队
专家级 - 双重风暴！在释放第一个超猴侠风暴后的短时间内会释放第二次风暴，摧毁屏幕上所有小气球并重创飞艇
向周围射出8个刺钉，每个刺钉能够击破一个气球
部落乌龟水陆两栖，向气球扔出长枪和椰子，椰子会对陶瓷气球造成额外伤害并且可以击破冰冻气球和铅气球
专家级 - 左右开弓！经过训练的专业乌龟能够同时扔出长枪和椰子，椰子会对陶瓷气球造成额外伤害并且可以击破冰冻气球和铅气球
香蕉在腐烂前持续25秒，而不是15秒
持续生成现金并储存在银行中，每回合获得10%的利息，最多存储$5000
每回合获得20%的利息，最多存储$20,000
更高功率的马达允许气球切割机吸入并切割铅气球等更重的气球
双层刀片切割双层气球，单次切割能够切割两层气球
超宽漏斗使气球切割机能够吸入并切割飞艇
三重漏斗能够最大限度的提升切割气球的效率
技能：超级吸附会将接近的气球全部吸附到气球切割机上，持续8秒
炸弹爆炸后会产生8个碎片，碎片可击破气球
炸弹爆炸后会产生次级炸弹，而不是碎片
气球被击中后会被眩晕
更大的爆炸范围和更大的爆炸威力
增强弹速，范围，伤害，和射速
技能：致命导弹会自动寻找最近的飞艇并摧毁它
每个回旋镖可击破7个气球
投掷更锋利，更快，更大的利刃而非回旋镖
利刃自动在气球间弹射
增加两个环绕在回旋镖猴旁边的利刃
音速回旋镖能够击破冰冻气球
炽热的回旋镖可击破铅气球
技能：在10秒内使回旋镖猴的攻速变得非常快
每发激光能够击破13个气球，可击破冰冻气球
一条坚固的气球毁灭光线
飞镖移动速度更快，每个飞镖可以击破3个气球
飞镖可击破所有类型的气球
发射小型导弹而非飞镖
技能：向屏幕上最近的100个气球发射导弹
再次提升射程，可以看见迷彩气球
投石机投出的刺钉球能够击破18个气球
巨型刺钉球可对陶瓷气球造成更多伤害
每个飞镖可额外击破1个气球
每个飞镖可额外击破2个气球
一次投出3个飞镖而非1个
技能：在10秒内将附近的10个飞镖猴变为超猴侠
被胶水覆盖的气球每过几秒腐蚀一层
强效溶剂每秒融化两层气球
每发胶水可喷溅最多6个气球
技能：粘住屏幕上的所有气球
一次射击4个飞镖而非2个
解锁“追踪”目标选项，可自动追踪气球
锋利旋翼可撕碎接触到的气球，包括冰冻气球和铅气球
增加大型导弹阵列和强力机枪
更加强力的喷气机使直升机的移动速度更快
允许直升机探测并攻击迷彩气球
将直升机附近的气球吹回入口处
技能：空投生命和现金补给，或移动大部分类型的防御塔
冻结范围更大，冻结时间更长
气球被冻结后损失一层气球
提升冻结范围，并大幅降低冰猴附近气球的移速
被冻结的气球会冻结与其接触的其他气球
被冻结的气球解冻后移速变慢
冻结两层气球，延长减速时间
被冻结的气球被击破后会飞出锋利的碎片
技能：冻结屏幕上的所有气球
每个飞镖可击破8个气球
飞镖可自动追踪并击破气球
气球会为自己的莽撞进犯感到后悔
每三秒落下一颗菠萝炸弹
允许皇家飞行员击破迷彩气球
技能：投下一颗巨大的炸弹，摧毁屏幕上所有的气球并对飞艇造成伤害
发射更强大的魔法炮弹

强大的Bloonarius从黑暗的地底升起，只有你能够打败他，你需要使出浑身解数来制服这个庞然大物，但是要注意：它吸收的仆从越多，你就会收到越多的惩罚！

From the fiery core itself, Blastapopoulos brings destruction to the world of BTD. His awesome fireball attack leaves your towers powerless to stop him as he blazes his trail of destruction. Do you have what it takes to send this demon back where he came from?

The deadly master of air has descended from the skies to wreak havoc on your monkeys. Vortex’s powerful air attacks will leave your towers stunned and reeling in his wake. Only the best players will be able to survive his onslaught. Can you?

Darts bounce harmlessly off Dreadbloon’s tough hide and only the most powerful explosive attacks stand a chance of getting through his thick armour. Do you have enough firepower to cut this giant down to size?

Battle Stations everyone! Boss Bloons have been sighted and we're going to need every able monkey for the upcoming battles. Sharpen your darts and head to the track select screen to take on the boss and win some amazing rewards!

金气球是在活动期间内出现的特殊气球，受到伤害后会掉落猴钞，击破后会给予更多的奖励
只有右上角带有金气球图标的地图才会出现金气球，金气球可在任意难度出现，但更高的难度会得到更好的奖励
击破后会掉落猴钞和特工
应考虑使用特殊建筑和特工

The Preferred Monkey event has begun!
Challenge yourself with some surprising monkey combinations by using all of the Preferred Monkeys on specific tracks for awesome bonus rewards. What new strategies will you discover?

The Preferred Monkey event has begun!
%s Tower Skin will be enabled while participating in the event. Challenge yourself to complete specific tracks using the skinned tower for awesome bonus rewards. What new strategies will you discover?

The Preferred Monkey event has ended!
If you have enjoyed the tower skin it can be purchased in the store.

猴子小队活动正在进行！
仅使用指定的防御塔通过一张地图将会使你的奖励x4！
Visit the App Store to check out all the latest Apps from the Ninja Kiwi team.\n\nTap 'GO' to jump to our App Store page.

Update 1.1 is here and we've added 2 brand new maps, The Eye and Z Factor. We've also included double replay rewards so you can now earn twice as much Monkey Money when replaying a track. If you just want to jump into a game without delay then check out the new Quick Play mode which will take you straight onto the battlefield!

Update 1.2 is here and it's time for some awesome new content. First up is a brand new beginner map, Brick Wall. Can you gain all 3 medals? Due to popular demand we've also added the ability to unlock Sandbox Mode! Sandbox is perfect for experimenting with towers and tactics. More content coming soon!

Brand new Tower, Track and Game Mode! First up is the brand new intermediate track, Workshop, a perfect playground for Engineers. Next up is an awesome tower, The Engineer, which can be upgraded to access powerful sentry guns. We've also added the ability to unlock Fast Track. Bypass early rounds and start the game from round 26.

It's time for an awesome new Track, Game Mode and Social Functionality! The Great Divide is an advanced track which will prove a real challenge, but so will all existing tracks with brand new Reverse Mode! \nYou can also prove to all your friends that you are number 1 by connecting to Facebook for high score comparisons.

Test your skills on the brand new Jungle track featuring 2 seperate paths for added difficulty.\nProud of your achievements in BTD? Reached an exceptionally high round? Now you can share all of your finest moments with friends through the Everyplay video capture system.

Play co-op with your friends!

Grab your sharpest darts and jump into two-player cooperative Bloons TD 5 for the first time ever on mobile! Featuring custom made maps for co-op chaos, BTD5 Co-op is a brand new challenge for you and your friends. Figure out the best way to work together with your shared money and lives to earn the new achievements and all the Awesome that goes with it.

That is not all. We have also been busy polishing up the visuals to make it much more awesomer and you can now play the game in 15 different languages.

It’s time to test your skills on 2 brand new tracks, Country Road and U-Turn.
Country Road is an intermediate track with a reasonable degree of difficulty, while the advanced difficulty of U-Turn will test even the most confident players. Do you have what it takes to gain all 3 medals?
Both tracks are also available for co-op play!

New Tower is here! Check out the Bloonchipper and 4 brand new tracks.
That’s right, in this awesome update you can add the Bloonchipper to your arsenal of bloon popping weaponry. Rapidly suck up bloons, shred off some layers and spit out the remains. Perfect for slowing down large groups of bloons. Try it out now on the all new tracks, including Treetop, Maze and the Halloween Themed, Patch and Scorched Earth!
Also, if you want to play private matches in Co-Op without using Facebook then you can now use Game Center to find your friends. Jump in and start up a Co-Op match today.

The latest update is a festive present, but the bloons have wrapped it tight with a special bow, and you have to pop bloons to open it.
Happy Holidays from Ninja Kiwi!

It’s time for another big content drop as we add 4 new tracks to the mix. 3 Times Round, Lava Fields, Rink Revenge and Runway will test your skills to the limit as they range from Beginner all the way through to Advanced difficulty. 3 of these tracks have also been added into the Co-Op line-up so you can team up with a friend and take them head on together.
Thanks again to all our players and Happy Holidays from the Ninja Kiwi team!

Happy New Year!
It's time for the first content drop of 2014 and to get you started we've added 2 brand new tracks, Water Hazard and Dune Sea.
Both tracks have 2 paths for increased difficulty and at intermediate and advanced difficulties they should provide a good degree of challenge.
Both tracks have also been added to Co-Op lineup so you can tackle them with a friend!

Update 2.6 is here and now that winter is gone we're heating things up with 2 all new tracks, Lobby and Down the Drain. Ranked at beginner and expert difficulty they are guaranteed to provide a challenge for players of all skill levels and Down the Drain is also available for Co-Op play.
Stay tuned for more awesome content coming soon!

Our congratulations go to ADRIANO ROSSI who won our recent Facebook 250k likes competition! Adriano designed our new track Mountain Skull Peak, which you can play in this 2.7 update. Mountain Skull Peak is a beginner track and suitable for all skill levels so be sure to check it out.
For the latest info on all things Ninja Kiwi and to be in with a chance of winning any future competitions be sure to like us on Facebook. As always, stay tuned for more awesome content coming soon!

So you think you've mastered the game? You've beaten heaps of tracks, gained a ton of gold medals, and even conquered tracks in reverse. You think you might just be unstoppable...
Well think again as update 2.8 introduces Impoppable mode, an insane new difficulty taking the game to a whole new level of extreme!
More expensive towers, faster and stronger Bloons, and did we mention you can't lose any lives? Challenge yourself with Impoppable, but don't say we didn't warn you.

It’s time to take a spin on the daily challenge wheel! This ancient wheel has been discovered deep in the heart of the Sun God temple and contains 4 new challenges every day. Choose a difficulty then spin the wheel to be presented with a track and 4 towers only. Your task is to complete the challenge using only these towers.
There are 28 challenges to complete each week before the counter resets so don’t delay. Jump in and take on a challenge today!

It's time for an all new track, Long Range. This Advanced difficulty track will prove a real challenge with its limited placement area for towers. Long range towers and seeking attacks will work best, so you'll need to be creative with placement in order to stop the Bloons from snaking down the claustrophobic canyon.
Good Luck!

Update 2.11 is here and it's time for a brand new track, Checkers. This beginner difficulty track twists and turns, providing a perfect landscape for honing your skills.
We also have some exciting news, the official BTD5 merchandise is now available! Browse our selection of apparel and be sure to check out the awesome Super Monkey plush by visiting the store in game.

Are you brave enough to take on the brand new track Crypt Keeper? Meddlesome ghouls and ghosts guide the Bloons through this spooky graveyard into the crypts and out through a network of graves making this an advanced difficulty path.
Too scared? Team up with a friend and tackle Crypt Keeper in co-op!

It's time for a huge holiday content drop as we add 4 all new tracks into the mix. Have some festive fun in Candy Land and Express Shipping or if you'd prefer to warm up this winter check out Pyramids and Tar Pit.
At this special time of year we'd also like to take the time to thank every single one of our players for being awesome and playing our games. Happy Holidays from all at Ninja Kiwi!

To celebrate the launch of our latest game we're bringing you a brand new intermediate track: Wattle Trees!
Designed especially for Boomerang Monkeys, this is one of several special tracks found in our brand new game Bloons Monkey City.

Prepare to face Poseidon's wrath in the awesome new Odyssey mode!

Each week the Ninja Kiwi community team will hand craft an epic journey worthy of only the most seasoned explorers. Take on up to 5 tracks back to back armed with only a single set of lives.

Do you have what it takes to master the challenge and reap the rewards?

On your marks, get set, go! It's time to race head to head with the Bloons on an all new beginner map, Sprint Track. Compete on hard mode to prove you're the champion and claim the Gold Medal!
Due to popular demand, we've added an auto round start option to the Pause menu. Auto round start means no pause between rounds, so be careful on tough rounds!

Get tangled up in a brand new Advanced map, Battle Knot. The Bloons attack from 3 directions at once to try and tie you up in knots!
If you're coming undone, why not rope in a friend and tackle this map in co-op?

Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate Bloons master? Prove it with the brand new Masteries mode!
The Bloons are now tougher than ever so you'd better bring your A game. There's double rewards, increased Monkey Lab research, and 5 new exclusive medals per map to be won in this ultimate challenge.

Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate Bloons master? Prove it with the brand new Masteries mode!
The Bloons are now tougher than ever so you'd better bring your A game. There's double rewards, increased Monkey Lab research, and 5 new exclusive medals per map to be won in this ultimate challenge.
Exclusive for iPhone 6S and iPhone 6S Plus: We've also added Force Touch support. Just push hard on any tower with an ability to activate it immediately! You can also force touch a tower in the sidebar to instantly show it's upgrades.

Daily quests are here! Complete a wide range of tasks from Bloon popping to tower placing and everything in between to win some fantastic rewards.\n\nNew quests will appear every day so there's always something to keep your monkeys busy. Jump to it!

What’s that coming over the hill? Is it a Boss Bloon?
The mighty Boss Bloons from Monkey City are invading BTD5! Look for the button on the track select screen for your chance to challenge one of these terrible behemoths and win some fantastic rewards. New bosses will appear over time so make sure you check back often!

Every day I'm poppin' 'em!
Now there's even more reason to get your daily fix of bloon popping fun, brand new daily rewards! We've filled the Daily Reward Chest with all sorts of exciting goodies including Monkey Money, free towers and Special Agents! Check back every day to see what you get!
We've also added support for a new type of special event so look out for that!

We're making a splash with update 3.4 and a brand new map, River Rapids! This fun Intermediate map features lots of water areas and is great for towers like the Buccaneer.
We've also detected a brand new bloon headed your way - the Golden Bloon! Find and pop this golden trickster in certain maps for Monkey Money and agent rewards. Look out for the Golden Bloon when it invades the track select screen soon!

Things are looking very dark and spooky in Bloons TD 5. It must be Halloween!
Give yourself a scare with the frightfully fun new map, Six Feet, but be warned, this terrifying track is not for the fearful! Give it a try in co-op mode if you don't want to be alone in the dark!
Halloween is over and the ghosts and ghouls have been chased away for another year. Back to the regular bloon popping fun!
Bloons TD5 Stickers are now available exclusively on iOS 10! Whatever your message, say it with bloons! Find them in iMessage now!

Are you the very best? Like no-one ever was? It's time to prove it with the all new weekly leaderboards! Aim for the highest score possible in the weekly task to climb the leaderboards and earn fantastic rewards!
To celebrate the holidays we've also added the brand new Snowy Backyard map. This beginner map is full of festive fun with plenty of space for towers and farms. Try it now and Happy Holidays!
To celebrate the holidays we've added the brand new Snowy Backyard map. This beginner map is full of festive fun with plenty of space for towers and farms. Try it now and Happy Holidays!

You'll be fighting against the currents with this update as we add the brand new Benguela map! This expert level map features multiple entry and exit points and very limited space on land. You'll need your very best water towers to conquer this challenge!
Spring has sprung in BTD 5 with our brand new track: Rabbit Holes! This beginner map will have your monkeys haring around after bloons as they disappear in and out of the ground. Can you keep up?

Head into the trenches with the all new Bloonvasion event! Defeat 50 waves of bloons on an exclusive map to win fabulous prizes. Only certain towers are allowed on the front lines each day so strategy is key! Look out for this limited time event on the track select screen.

Ready your blade and prepare for battle on our brand new map: Siege! The bloons are storming the castle on this tricky advanced map and it's up to the Monkeys of the Round Table to stop them! Can you halt the bloon invasion and save the realm?

It's that time of year when all things ghastly and grim are creeping out after dark and BTD5 is looking scarily spooky. Get caught up in some terrifyingly tricky bloon popping on our all new expert map: Web. Not brave enough to face your fears alone? Bring along a friend for some frightful co-op fun!

It's the festive season in BTD5 but it's not just Santa visiting these houses, it's the bloons! Put them on the naughty list in our new winter beginner map, Present Delivery. Happy holidays from everyone at Ninja Kiwi!

It's time for an all new special event in BTD5: Preferred Monkey! Challenge yourself to complete specific tracks using the preferred monkeys for awesome bonus rewards. What new strategies will you discover?

Spring has sprung in BTD5 which means it's time for a fresh new update!
Take some time to smell the roses as you burst into Bloom, the all new beginner map. Bloons are invading this springtime paradise and it's up to you to clean them out.
Let's get popping!

Prepare for Challenge Monkey! An all new, limited time event that dares you to complete maps using ONLY a hand picked team of monkeys. There are amazing rewards available, if you're up to the challenge!
Are you ready for two new maps? You might get lost in the woods on the expert map Forest Path, and then there is the strangely compelling coastal scenery on the intermediate map Village Shore. Enjoy!

Things are going bump in the night in BTD5 and that can only mean one thing... It's Halloween! This year we've got a whole new event for the spookiest of seasons: Trick or Treat! Challenge yourself to take on 50 scarily difficult rounds with a tricky twist for some amazing rewards. That's not all though, we've also got a monsterous new monkey skin available in the store and a brand new map for you to sink your teeth into!

Take on 25 brutally tough rounds in the ultimate test of your bloon popping skills: The Crucible! Your only chance to defeat these rounds is to harness the Altars of Power and supercharge your towers with blistering speed.
Plus we've added a brand new map, Hearthside, and decked the halls with our festive winter theme! Happy Holidays from everyone at Ninja Kiwi!

The golden bananas of Tutankhabloon were lost to the ages... until now!
Explore an ancient treasure trove on a brand new intermediate map, Ancient Tomb! There's room for two on this expedition so why not bring a friend and tackle the tomb in co-op mode!

Spring time is just around the corner so step outside with the brand new intermediate map, Walk in the Park. This fresh new map can be played solo or co-op so grab a friend and picnic while you pop.
We’ve also added private match codes to make jumping into some co-op action even easier!

New Map - Flooded Lane!
Things are looking seriously soggy in everyone's favorite beginner map! Monkey Lane has been flooded! There's water all over the best tower spots making this a much trickier map than before. Bring your Buccaneers and shine up those Subs if you want stand a chance at this watery challenge!

You'll be seeing double in this update as two brand new maps arrive in BTD5. Head in the Clouds is a vertigo inducing intermediate map set high above a bustling city. You'll need both feet firmly on the ground to tackle this challenge. For a more down to earth game, try the new beginner map; Oasis. This tropical paradise might seem serene, but you can never let your guard down when there are Bloons around.

Feel a chill in the air? Winter has arrived in Bloons TD 5! Dive into a winter wonderland in a new beginner map: Snowman. This snowy spectacle has more loops and bends than a festive bow so you'll have plenty of places to put your favorite towers. Happy Holidays from everyone at Ninja Kiwi!

Step inside the Forgotten Garden and uncover this all new intermediate map. This old and mysterious greenhouse has plenty of twists and turns for your monkeys to take advantage of, plus a helpful pond for your buccaneers and subs. Can you take advantage of the opportunity and earn all the garden's medals?

The Bloons are not messing around on this one! A map so tough, so brutal, it can only be called EXTREME! For the first time ever, we're adding an all new Extreme difficulty map: Toxic Waste. Four incredibly short paths that only the most skilled monkeys will be able to defend. Luckily, it takes more than some off-color water to scare your subs and buccaneers. And lets face it, you're going to need all the help you can get!

It's update time in BTD5 once again! This time we're bringing you an all new map: Parking Lot. This beginner map features plenty of spaces to park your towers and line up the perfect shot on the Bloons. For extra fun, try car-pooling with a friend in co-op mode!

We're falling into fall in BTD5 with an all new intermediate map: Autumn Leaves! There's a chill in the air so make sure your monkeys are wrapped up warm when they go to take on the bloons amongst piles of freshly fallen leaves.

Snow is falling all around us? Monkeys playing, having fun? It must be the BTD5 winter update! This year we're heading north for a real challenge. A new advanced map: Igloos. The Bloons enter this snow covered landscape from two different directions so you'll need a versatile defense to stop them. Happy Holidays from everyone at Ninja Kiwi!

New year, new map! Step into 2021 with an all new advanced map, Bigfoot. You'll need to put your best foot forward to stomp out the Bloons before they can toe-tally wreck your defenses! Take on this oversized challenge solo or with a friend in co-op mode!

Bring a splash of color to your bloons game in an all new map: Daffodils. The bloons are attacking this springtime sanctuary and its up to you to stop them. Luckily this beginner map has plenty of space for you to bring your flowery firepower to bear. Time to spring into action!

The tide is coming in and bringing with it waves of Bloons! Luckily the monkeys are here to defend the beaches on a new advanced map: Tidal Pools. The path is short so you'll need to make the most of the Monkey Sub friendly pools and central choke point to turn back the tide.

Land Ho! Follow the guiding light of the lighthouse onto an all new advanced map: Land's End. The Bloons have taken a firm hold of this rocky coastline and only your monkeys can send them packing. Buccaneers and Subs can rain down destruction from the sea while your other monkeys attack from inland. Now's your chance to shine!

It's that time of year again where spirits start to walk the earth. It's not just spirits emerging from the dark though, the Bloons are too! Send them back to the other side on an all new advanced map: Day of the Undead. Take on this challenging map solo or make it a real party and bring a friend in co-op mode!

Santa's been busy in his workshop getting ready for the holidays but he'll never finish the toys in time with all these Bloons in the way! Send your monkeys in to help in this all new beginner map: Toyland. Whether you're playing solo or sharing the festive fun in coop mode, everyone at Ninja Kiwi wishes you a Happy Holiday!

Take on the Bloons in the sands of South America in a new beginner map: Nazca Lines. The Bloons are all over these mysterious relics and it's up to you to drive them off. With no water or other obstacles to stand in your way it'll be down to pure popping to bring this inflatable insurgence to an end! Time to sharpen those darts!

Springtime has arrived in BTD5 and the Easter Bunny has been busy! The all new Advanced map Egg Hunt is covered in Easter Eggs so the Monkeys have to be careful where they step! Finding useful places for your towers away from the eggs is sure to be a challenge. Luckily there's a pleasant pond for your Buccaneers and Subs to help out from. Can you master the strategy and earn the medals?

Gather round the warm glow of an all new map: Campfire. This map might look comforting but don't be fooled. It's an Extreme challenge! Three super short paths mean you're going to need a lot of firepower if you want to return from this camping trip with a medal!

Get ready for some rapid play in an all new Expert map: Tributaries! Five short paths that create a torrent of Bloons plus limited placement areas mean you'll be crying a river unless you can come up with a strategy that really flows. Good luck!

10 years of BTD 5? WOW! To celebrate, we have some awesome content to get the party started! First up, it's time to dust off the dancing shoes in our new map: Dance Floor. We've also added an agent to help blow out those Birthday candles: The Ninja Kiwi. To top it off, we've added some premium skins to give our 10 year old towers a nostalgic feel! For the icing on the cake, we've added a new game mode: Ten. This challenges you to beat any map using a select 10 towers. Hip Hip, Hooray!

Happy Valentines Day Bloon poppers! To celebrate we're adding a sweet new Valentines themed Intermediate map: Lonely Heart. Every monkey knows there's nothing more romantic than popping Bloons in a field of roses and cherry blossoms. Why not make it a date and play in co-op mode!

Get ready to throw down in the throne room! The Bloons are after the Monkey King's crown in an all new intermediate map, Over-Throne! Place your royal protectors on the thrones and power them up to lead your forces to victory! For the Monkey King!

There's a chill in the air which can only mean one thing; winter has arrived in Bloons TD 5! Warm yourself up with some winter sports on the new map, Bobsleigh Run! Chase the Bloons round the twists and turns of the high speed track with a Tack Shooter or take advantage of the final straight with a well-placed Juggernaut. Happy holidays!

We're going 0-100 in no time flat with 2 awesome new maps: Fast Track and Mosaic! Fast Track is a high octane, Intermediate map that features special boosters to give the Bloons a temporary burst of speed while Mosaic is a more serene, Easy track with sweeping curves and long straights. Plus, we're moving 2 co-op exclusive maps, Cash Money and Alpine Lake, into the single player pool, bringing us to a grand total of 100 total maps!

Roll for initiative on an exciting new map: Dark Dungeon! The Bloons have rolled a crit on their stealth check as they sneak between connected trapdoors to avoid your monkeys on this tricky new Intermediate map. Luckily, this dungeon has some excellent water placement areas and some prime Dartling and Juggernaut locations to give your monkeys advantage on their attacks. Tackle this new challenge solo or party up with a friend in co-op mode.

It’s that special time of year again and a cool mystery parcel has arrived in the village. However, the Bloons have managed to intercept the delivery and have sealed the gift with a special bow. The Monkeys are having difficulty unwrapping it and they need your help. What’s inside? It's awesome, but you have to pop a bunch of bloons to find out!
In order to assist you in your mission we’ve added a brand new track, North Pole. This beginner track is also available in co-op mode. This holiday is the perfect time to try out co-op matches with friends.
For the holidays, the village has also been given a lick of festive cheer, and it's in that spirit that we want to say thanks to all of our players. We sincerely appreciate your time and your feedback, and we'll do our very best to keep bringing awesome updates and cool new games your way.
Happy Holidays from the Ninja Kiwi team!
Check out all the latest Apps from the Ninja Kiwi team.\n\nTap 'GO' to jump to our store page.

Welcome to Bloons TD 5!
Jump in and start checking out all of the never-before-seen awesomeness - Heli Pilot tower, new Special Missions, Monkey Lab upgrades, Radadactyl Special Agent, tier 4 Specialty Buildings and so much more!

Keep an eye on the town message board for the latest news and updates on Bloons TD 5!

Update 1.1 is here and it's time for some awesome new content. First up is a brand new beginner map, Brick Wall. Can you gain all 3 medals? Due to popular demand we've also added the ability to unlock Sandbox Mode! Sandbox is perfect for experimenting with towers and tactics. More content coming soon!

Brand new Tower, Track and Game Mode! First up is the brand new intermediate track, Workshop, a perfect playground for Engineers. Next up is an awesome tower, The Engineer, which can be upgraded to access powerful sentry guns. We've also added the ability to unlock Fast Track. Bypass early rounds and start the game from round 26.
Brand new Tower, and Game Mode! Time for a new awesome tower, The Bloonchipper, which can be upgraded to shred MOAB class bloons. We've also added the ability to unlock reverse mode for tracks.

Play co-op with your friends!

Grab your sharpest darts and jump into two-player cooperative Bloons TD 5 for the first time ever on mobile! Featuring custom made maps for co-op chaos, BTD5 Co-op is a brand new challenge for you and your friends. Figure out the best way to work together with your shared money and lives to earn the new achievements and all the Awesome that goes with it.

That is not all. We have also been busy polishing up the visuals to make it much more awesomer and you can now play the game in 15 different languages.

It’s time to test your skills on 2 brand new tracks, Country Road and U-Turn.
Country Road is an intermediate track with a reasonable degree of difficulty, while the advanced difficulty of U-Turn will test even the most confident players. Do you have what it takes to gain all 3 medals?
Both tracks are also available for co-op play!

New Tower is here! Check out the Bloonchipper and 4 brand new tracks.
That’s right, in this awesome update you can add the Bloonchipper to your arsenal of bloon popping weaponry. Rapidly suck up bloons, shred off some layers and spit out the remains. Perfect for slowing down large groups of bloons. Try it out now on the all new tracks, including Treetop, Maze and the Halloween Themed, Patch and Scorched Earth!

Cloud Saves!
Bloons TD 5 now supports cloud saves on Android devices. Go to the settings menu to back up your save data or transfer it to another Android device. You must be signed in to Google Game Services to use the cloud save feature.
We've also added Google Play Achievements! Try and collect them all!

You can now record up to 2 minutes of gameplay to share with your friends via Everyplay. Hit the camera button in the top right of the screen to start or stop the recording, then share the video from the pause menu!

Play co-op with your friends! Update 2.0 is here and it's our most awesome content drop yet. Grab your sharpest darts and jump into two-player cooperative Bloons TD 5 for the first time ever on mobile! Featuring custom made maps for co-op chaos, BTD5 Co-op is a brand new challenge for you and your friends. Figure out the best way to work together with your shared money and lives to earn the new achievements and all the Awesome that goes with it.
That is not all....We have also been busy polishing up the visuals to make it much more awesomer and you can now play the game in 15 different languages.
Also included in this build:
* various bug fixes.
Have fun and stayed tuned for more awesome content coming your way soon!
You have a Heli Pilot! This powerful attack copter has multiple patrol options. Choose between Follow Mouse, Lock'n'Place and Patrol, where it will attack between two set points.

Lab upgrades provide a boost in the battlefield every time you play! To fund your research, you need Tokens which you gain by beating tracks and Special Missions. The lab displays how many Tokens are required for the next upgrade. Click each upgrade to learn its benefits.

This is the Agents and Abilities deployment bar. From here you can drag Agents onto the battlefield just like regular towers.\n\nAbilities are slightly different. Once you unlock an ability it will be added to the deployment bar and you simply click the icon to activate it. The ability will then go on a cooldown timer and you won't be able to activate it again until the timer resets.
点击一个防御塔以超频...
你有一个特工，特工是一次性道具，有些特工是防御塔，有些则是强力的技能，你可以通过点击星星按钮查看你有多少特工

One of your towers now has an Activated Ability. These are extremely powerful abilities that can be used when you get in trouble. Each ability is on a 'cool-down' before it can be used again. You can use the ability by clicking the ability icons above the deployment bar.
你有一个香蕉农场！香蕉农场每回合会自动生产香蕉，移动光标可以将香蕉转换成现金，别等太长时间——香蕉在10秒不收集后会腐烂
点击信息按钮可以查看说明
每天点击每日奖励宝箱以获得更多的免费猴钞
Visit the App Store to check out all the latest Apps from the Ninja Kiwi team.\n\nClick 'GO' to jump to our App Store page.
使用机枪射出飞镖，射向你的鼠标指向的位置
每回合长出几串能够给予你额外现金的香蕉，移动鼠标收集
Congratulations, you've popped enough Bloons to unwrap the mysterious parcel. Click on the present to uncover the gift inside!

Play co-op with your friends!\n\nGrab your sharpest darts and jump into two-player cooperative Bloons TD 5. Featuring custom made maps for co-op chaos, BTD5 Co-op is a brand new challenge for you and your friends. Figure out the best way to work together with your shared money and lives to earn the new achievements and all the Awesome that goes with it.
Armed with sharp acorns, this special agent goes berserk when bloons leak. For a few seconds, he attacks super fast, can spot camo, and pop lead.

Pro Upgrade - Anger Mismanagement! Despite counselling the squirrel agent is even angrier. He gets so worked up that every 50 acorns he goes berserk even if bloons haven't leaked, attacking super fast, spotting camo, and popping lead.
Tired of picking up all those bananas yourself? So is this guy but at least he's paid to do it. Farmer will auto-gather all bananas in his radius so you don't have to.
Pro Upgrade - Banana Cannon! Farmer collect bananas from nearby Farms, then shoots the skins onto the track, making bloons slide back toward the entrance.
This agent has a hive of angry bees that zip to their targets and sting bloons until all layers are popped. Stingers can't pop lead or ice but regrower Bloons beware.
Pro Upgrade - Swarm! The Swarm Activated Ability launches 100 bees that will seek targets and pop them mercilessly for a short duration. Can't pop lead or ice but regrower bloons beware!
Plant this fast-growing bloon killer right on the track. Loses a thorn for each bloon popped, but grows 10 thorns between each round (up to 200).

Pro Upgrade - Creepers! Creepers appear every 3 rounds and can grow up to 15 thorns each. Protect them as Creepers are destroyed if stripped of thorns. Main bush still grows 10 thorns per round up to 200.
Rapidly sucks up and shreds bloons, spitting what's left out the back.
The Bloonsday Device gives you temporary control of the orbital strike satellite, whose beam destroys all bloons and does big damage to MOAB-class bloons.

Pro Upgrade - Plasmatic Fusion! Focal doubling at the point of impact leaves a trail of plasma along the strike path, so hot it will continue to damage all bloons and MOAB-classes until spent or dissipated.
Shoots a single bomb that explodes in a radius burst. Can pop lead bloons.
Throws a single boomerang in an arc, can pop 3 bloons.
Shoots a single dart that pops a single bloon.
Placed directly on the track, these explode after 3 seconds.
Shoots a glob of monkey glue that slows a single bloon.
Powerful attack helicopter armed with twin dart shooters and multiple patrol options.
Temporarily freezes nearby bloons. Frozen bloons are immune to sharp objects.
Meerkat Spy has no attack, but instead uses his super keen senses to spot Camo Bloons, granting Camo Detection for all towers within his radius.
Pro Upgrade - Cyber Eye! No longer weaponless, the Meerkat Pro can now blast any single bloon into dust and help put the hurt on MOAB-class bloons. Grants camo detection to all towers in his radius.
Patrols the skies above the action, blasting the area with 8 powerful darts.
Throws magic bolts that can pop 2 bloons each.
Shoots a single, heavy dart that can pop up to 5 bloons each. Water only.
Uses a powerful nail gun, and builds traps, sentries, and enhancers.
Shoots a single dart that pops a single bloon.
Shoots a single dart that pops a single bloon.
Submarine tower that shoots homing darts. Has many powerful upgrades including the ability to submerge and become a support tower.
Reduces cost of all towers and upgrades in radius by 10%.
Launches explosive mortar shells to a single targeted spot.
Throws sharp shurikens rapidly and can see camo bloons.
The Ninja Kiwi kicks so fast bloons are sent flying back.
Pro Upgrade - Even quicker kicks that can pop lead too.
Place almost any land tower on water with the Pontoon! Deploy the pontoon on water, then place your land tower on top.

Pro Upgrade - Primo Pontoon! In addition to luxury fittings, the Primo Pontoon has an uplink to Monkey Town HQ, granting any attached tower a range bonus. Place on water then place your land tower on top.
Nowhere to float your boat? Smart monkeys know they can place a Portable Lake on land, allowing any water unit to be deployed within its waters.

Pro Upgrade - Sea Monster! New Activated Ability temporarily awakens the Sea Monster, which bashes nearby bloons, popping 5 layers and sometimes stunning them. Any water unit can be placed in the Lake.
These slick prehistoric predators orbit their nest and pop any regular bloons they hit, but they can only pop so many before a new one has to hatch.
Pro Upgrade - Radderdactyls! Bigger wing blow back bloons with each flap, and they can pop far more regular bloons before going back to the nest.
Placed directly on the track, each pack of spikes can pop 10 bloons.
Pops 2 layers off of bloons, with unlimited range.
Each round generates piles of road spikes that can pop 5 bloons each.
It's a bird. It's a plane. It's a squadron of flying super-powered laser-beamin' monkeys who destroy every single bloon on screen and do big damage to MOAB-class bloons.
Pro Upgrade - Double Storm! A second pass of Super Monkeys follows the first after a short delay, destroying every bloon on screen and damaging MOAB-classes.
Shoots 8 tacks spread in all directions, each tack can pop 1 bloon.
Tribal Turtle can live on land or water. Throws spears and coconuts, coconuts do extra damage to ceramic bloons and can pop frozen and lead bloons.

Pro Upgrade - Ambidexterity! Elite training allows the Turtle Pro to throw spear and coconut simultaneously for maximum bloon hurt. Coconuts do extra damage to ceramic bloons and can pop frozen and lead bloons.

Take on 25 brutally tough rounds in the ultimate test of your bloon popping skills: The Crucible! Your only chance to defeat these rounds is to harness the Altars of Power. Place your towers on an altar to supercharge their attacks with blistering speed.
The Altars of Power are recharging but The Crucible will be available to play again soon. Get ready!
Can you pass 50 extra hard rounds using only 1 of each tower? Every second round you'll be given a different free tower but you can't buy any more and cash income is reduced.
The Mix 'N" Match event will be available to play again soon. Get ready!
Can you pass 50 scarily hard rounds using only 1 of each tower? Every second round you'll be treated to a different free tower! The trick is you can't buy any more and cash income is reduced.

We're busy stocking up on more treats but the Trick or Treat event will be available to play again soon. Get ready!

Can you pass 50 super tough rounds using only 1 of each tower? It's the season of giving so every second round Santa will gift you a different free tower! You'll need to be careful though, you can't buy any more towers and cash income is reduced.
Santa is out delivering presents right now but the Stocking Fillers event will be available to play again soon. Get ready!
